alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 1:22AM AKST until February 16 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow and cold wind chills to 45 below. North wind gusting to 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Near the Bering Strait. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. The wind chills to 45 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds, coldest wind chills and lowest visibility will be near the Bering Strait.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
